# @babel/core

> Babel compiler core.

See our website [@babel/core](https://babeljs.io/docs/babel-core) for more information or the [issues](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar associated with this package.

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/core
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/core --dev
```
